results.title: Effect of long term simvastatin administration as an adjunct to ursodeoxycholic acid: evidence for a synergistic effect on biliary bile acid composition but not on serum lipids in humans.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Eighteen @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Familial_primary_gastric_lymphoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535648 @@@primary non-familial hypercholesterolaemia@@@ were studied during treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_Ursodeoxycholic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014580 @@@UDCA@@@ 10 mg/kg/day, and a combination of the two drugs.

citations.NLM: Lanzarotto F, Panarotto B, Sorbara R, Panteghini M, Pagani F, Sosta S, Lanzini A. Effect of long term simvastatin administration as an adjunct to ursodeoxycholic acid: evidence for a synergistic effect on biliary bile acid composition but not on serum lipids in humans. Gut. 1999 Apr;44(4):552-6. PMID: 10075964
